channel.title: 2017-03-06 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-03-06 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 06 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description: The left shin looks to be in trouble and running seems to be stressing it further. I think it’s time to take some steps back and let the body recover.
item.content:encoded: The left shin looks to be in trouble and running seems to be stressing it further. I think it’s time to take some steps back and let the body recover.

item.title: 06 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description: A six mile short cut from CHS. Head over to the reservoir and then looped back to newton street via JD auto. No way compensates the 15mile run I had to do yesterday. New route and home by 5. Good days!
item.content:encoded: A six mile short cut from CHS. Head over to the reservoir and then looped back to newton street via JD auto. No way compensates the 15mile run I had to do yesterday. New route and home by 5. Good days!
